metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24883 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP).Prior to version 2.7.0, server side authentication against a `SAM` filemight be successful for invalid credentials if the server has configured aninvalid `SAM` file path. FreeRDP based clients are not affected. RDP serverimplementations using FreeRDP to authenticate against a `SAM` file areaffected. Version 2.7.0 contains a fix for this issue. As a workaround, usecustom authentication via `HashCallback` and/or ensure the `SAM` databasepath configured is valid and the application has file handles left.

criterions.comment: freerdp package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
